verses.roman:
pickāri-dhārā jini' aśru nayane
cāri-dikera loka saba karaye siṅcāne

synonyms: pickāri-dhārā—like water coming in force from a syringe; jini'—conquering; aśru—tears; nayane—in the eyes; cāri-dikera—in all four directions; loka—people; saba—all; karaye siṅcāne—moistened.
translation: The tears from the eyes of the Lord came out with great force, like water from a syringe. Indeed, all the people who surrounded Him were moistened by His tears.
